remarks: Division of a measure by a positive constant is a measure.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2016.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
measdivcstOLD $p |- ( ( M e. ( measures ` S ) /\ A e. RR+ ) -> ( x e. S |-> ( ( M ` x ) /e A ) ) e. ( measures ` S ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d M x $.
$d S x $.
